patterns.pattern_name: E/M Services During Global Period Without Modifier 24
patterns.description: Detect E/M services (99201-99215, 99221-99239) billed during the global period of a surgical procedure without modifier 24. This indicates the E/M service may be bundled with the surgical procedure and should not be separately billed.
patterns.nlp_description: Find all claims where an E/M service (evaluation and management codes like 99213, 99214) was billed during the global period of a surgical procedure (procedures with 010 or 090 global days) by the same provider or same TIN/specialty, and the E/M claim is missing modifier 24 (unrelated evaluation and management service).

detection_logic.step1: Identify all surgical procedures with global days values of 010 or 090
detection_logic.step2: Calculate the global period end date for each surgical procedure (service_date + global_days_value days)
detection_logic.step3: Find all E/M services (em_code IS NOT NULL) that occurred within the global period
detection_logic.step4: Filter for claims from same provider OR same TIN + specialty
detection_logic.step5: Filter for claims where modifier_24 is NULL (missing)
detection_logic.step6: Return the fraudulent claims with relevant details
